title: President grieved over death of MNA Asma Arbab’s father
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Friday expressed his deep grief over the death of the father of Member of National Assembly Asma Arbab Alamgir.
“We share the grief of her family in this hour of distress,” the president said, according to the President House press release.
He also prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed soul and strength for the grieved family to bear the loss.
